snippet: The move follows a Bank of Italy decision based on concerns over financial accountability and money-laundering controls.
abstract: Vatican museums and businesses are declining credit card and debit card purchases after decision by Bank of Italy linked to concerns over financial accountability and inadequate money-laundering controls.

byline.original: By ELISABETTA POVOLEDO and HARVEY MORRIS

lead_paragraph: The move follows a Bank of Italy decision based on concerns over financial accountability and money-laundering controls.
